title: Buffet service
description: In a buffet service, guests can choose their food from a wider selection made available on the buffet line.

title: Semi-self service
description: In this type of food service, diners place, pay, and pick up their orders at a counter similar to fast casual and fast-food establishments.

title: Self-service
description: Similar to self-service, this type of service requires diners to order and pay for their orders at the counter but waiters serve the food when ready.

title: Chinese banquet service
description: This is another form of waiter service where each waiter takes care of a table or group of tables with 10-12 guests. Dishes are usually communal and shared.

title: Waiter service
description: More commonly known as sit-down service, this type of service requires a waiter to take care of everything from taking orders to serving food and payment.
